com.sonf.core

接口 IOController<S>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractIOController, AbstractPollingIoController, NioChannelController

    public interface IOController<S>

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void activate()
      Set the IOController to be activated when the first sessions will be added to process, and this status will be quit only when all sessions closed This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.
      void cancelConnect(IOFuture future)
      Offer a cancel-connect request to Controller
      boolean connect(IOFuture future)
      Offer a Connect request to Controller,
      void deactivate()
      Set the IOController to be deactivated when the last session was removed(closed) from the processor.
      void dispose()
      Releases all resources allocated by this Controller.
      long getConnectCheckIntervalMs()
      Get the select timeout interval for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout)
      FilterChainBuilder getFilterChainBuilder() 
      IOHandler getHandler() 
      boolean isActive() 
      boolean isDisposing() 
      void setConnectCheckIntervalMs(long connectCheckIntervalMs)
      Set the select timeout intervel for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout) the value greater than 1000L will not take effect
      void setHandler(IOHandler handler)
      Sets the handler which will handle all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.

    • 方法详细资料

      • activate

        void activate()
        Set the IOController to be activated when the first sessions will be added to process, and this status will be quit only when all sessions closed This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.

      • deactivate

        void deactivate()
        Set the IOController to be deactivated when the last session was removed(closed) from the processor. This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        返回:
        a value of whether or not this Controller is active

      • getConnectCheckIntervalMs

        long getConnectCheckIntervalMs()
        Get the select timeout interval for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout)
        返回:
        interval time in millisecond

      • setConnectCheckIntervalMs

        void setConnectCheckIntervalMs(long connectCheckIntervalMs)
        Set the select timeout intervel for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout) the value greater than 1000L will not take effect
        参数:
        connectCheckIntervalMs - interval time in millisecond

      • connect

        boolean connect(IOFuture future)
        Offer a Connect request to Controller,
        参数:
        future - the ConnectFuture implementation bound to the IOSession which should be built a connection to some remote endpoint.
        返回:
        true if success, false otherwise

      • cancelConnect

        void cancelConnect(IOFuture future)
        Offer a cancel-connect request to Controller
        参数:
        future - the ConnectFuture implementation should be canceled

      • getFilterChainBuilder

        FilterChainBuilder getFilterChainBuilder()
        返回:
        the FilterChainBuilder which will build the IFilterChain of all IOSessions which is created by this Controller.

      • getHandler

        IOHandler getHandler()
        返回:
        the handler which will handle all all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.

      • setHandler

        void setHandler(IOHandler handler)
        Sets the handler which will handle all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.
        参数:
        handler - The IoHandler to use

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Releases all resources allocated by this Controller. Please note that this method might block as long as there are any sessions managed by this Controller.

      • isDisposing

        boolean isDisposing()
        返回:
        true if and if only dispose() method has been called. Please note that this method will return true even after all the related resources are released.
